Reviews.Title: Multi use camera
Reviews.Author: James L. Wagner
Reviews.Content: This camera allows us to see all of our oatio (20 X 60') whick allows us to keep our door closed and keep out the heat & see when our cats want in, plus this camera gives us sharp images for our security 24/7.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Super HAD CCD; Color DSP; Automatic CDS sensor
600 TV Line Horizontal Resolution
Weatherproof aluminum housing. Signal system: NTSC
Built-in 20 infrared LEDs and 3.6mm Lens (wide view angle)
DC 12 V 500mA regulated power supply and security warning decal included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu outdoor day night IR 600TVL CCTV security camera built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD weatherproof 20 infrared LEDs for home surveillance with bonus power supply and security warning decal 1O4
